name: Borderlands 2: Headhunter 5 - Sire Hammerlock Versus the Son Crawmerax
name_original: Borderlands 2: Headhunter 5 - Sire Hammerlock Versus the Son Crawmerax
description:
Borderlands 2: Headhunter 5 - Sire Hammerlock Versus the Son Crawmerax is an action, shooter and RPG game developed by Gearbox Software. It was originally released in 2014. 2K Games published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Borderlands 2: Headhunter 5 - Sire Hammerlock Versus the Son Crawmerax on PC and PlayStation 3.
